co.uk.niadel.mpi.measuresmpi

Class Measure

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.uk.niadel.mpi.measuresmpi.Measure

  • public final class Measure
extends java.lang.Object
    The actual Measure itself. The ModMeasure classes handle these internally.
    Author:
    Niadel
